songs.title: Grip Your Body
songs.lyrics:
"I just wanna grip yo body" (Go Head)

It's B.o.B! (HaHa)

[Verse 1]

Well gone and grip it
I get that thing wet like I'm bout to get the dishes
I've got positions but you must be physically conditioned (yea)
And how far I bend you all depends on your fitness (ooo)
But to be specific, I get things moist, call me Spongebob
If I use my tongue she'll be like, "Well done Bob." (uh huh)
I'll let it rip till she like, "Man I'm done Bob" (Aww)
Are we finished? Uh?... Naww

[Hook]

Cause I want to grip your body and I like it when it's real real sloppy
She looked me in my eyes and she said
"I just wanna grip yo body" (Ha) "Oh"
"I just wanna grip yo body" (8x)

[Verse 2]

HaHa, Is that so?
Well we can make arrangements girl I'll take you back home
I've got a nice soft comfy mattress in my room
And don't you know I'll swoop you off your feet just like Broom (ooh)
If you a freak I'll go deep, until you count sheep like Little Boe Peep
And when you wake up from your sleep, I promise
You gone be like Bob got the Deep (Yea)

[Hook]

[Verse 3]

It's B.o.B!
Lookin at your thighs off rip
I can tell that your love muscle got a real nice strong (Grip)
I ain't playin, If you really bout maybe we can make plans
And I can be your man, while you feelin on my (body)
So keep on doin what you doin with your (body body)
Here's a more accurate description
I'll be your pole, you pretend that you strippin

[Hook]
